value.title: PowerApps Email Attachments with the office 365 connector and attachment control
value.excerpt: In this video, you will learn how to use the PowerApps Attachment Control to send email attachments. We use the attachment control so the user can attach both files and images.  For PowerApps training or consulting check out https://www.PowerApps911.com

value.title: Powerapps on premise data gateway
value.excerpt: In this video, you will learn how to install and configure the PowerApps on premise data gateway. This will allow you to connect to your on prem SharePoint, SQL, and other data sources from PowerApps out in the cloud.   PowerApps Gateway Docs https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powerapps/gateway-reference

value.title: Power Apps - How to Create a Dialog Box in 3 Steps
value.excerpt: #PowerApps #DialogBox Dialog Boxes (also known as Modal windows or pop up boxes) are a great tool to have in your Power Apps Tool belt.  These temporary pop up windows allow you to gather additional information from your users.    In this video I show one of the most common use cases for a Dialog Box
